about_the_game:
To mark the halfway point of our Early Access development we are excited to present SCUM supporter pack #2! By popular demand we are releasing another round of extra goodies for the wonderful people that wish to further support SCUM development.

Items presented are here for visual presentation and cosmetics and make no impact on the gameplay in any meaningful way.

Movie script

If you want to know more about the lore of SCUM, we are happy to provide! Meet the key characters, the world, and events that lead to the current situation on the TEC-1 island. Who knows, you might even meet a future NPC or two!

Dance emotes

Party with your clanmates or random players in one of our famous nightclubs, or express yourself in victory as you survive another night on the island.

Music player

A Personal Music Player is now available to bring a unique atmosphere to your survival attempts. How will you soundtrack your next foray into the wilderness or base upgrade session?

Whether you enjoy the radio or even want to add your own (yes it’s possible!): you now have a personal soundtrack wherever you go.

Photo mode

A popular feature that will allow creative types to utilize our beautiful island for creative screenshots. Includes a free look camera, different settings and poses. It even works in the multiplayer for snaps with your squadmates!

UPDATE 1

  • Added 2 new hairstyles.

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all your support as we develop the best survival experience for you.

– The Gamepires Team

content_descriptors.notes: The game allows nudity but has an option to turn it off. It features alcohol and some drugs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
